column4: how do I set how to mount any usb dev ? I have a box with Etch and I have /etc/usbmount, on ubuntu, it is not, any idea ?
how do I set how to mount any usb dev ? I have a box with Etch and I have /etc/usbmount, on ubuntu, it is not, any idea ?
if you're still running under gnome it will be automounted in /media
yes, but I would like to change the way it mount them I woud like to remove the option noexec and nodev
umount them and remount them normally
